name: Valiant Vikings
description:
Valiant Vikings is a cute new game entering the 2D Sidescrolling / Platforming genre. You, the player, get to play as a yet unknown Viking, because the world of Vikings needs your help! Experience beautiful scenery, wild gameplay and awesome music.

The Valiant Vikings Alpha Version features a small piece of a long story. The Vikings have lived in peace for centuries, but this changes with the appearance of the Dark Lord. Since his arrival, the otherwise peaceful inhabitants behave strangely aggresive. There is also talk of the awakening of the monster in the high mountains. The Vikings need your help!

For anyone who doesn't always wants to see the same things. Discover different areas of the Viking world, but do not get lost in the beautiful surroundings!

Not the best at fighting? No problem! Valiant Vikings offers different styles of fighting! Wether you like melee combat or ranged combat, everything is waiting for you! Just grab a weapon and hop into intense fights with some Slimes!

Music by Michael Hamilton and Neat Invention! 

https://soundcloud.com/neatinvention/sets/valiant-vikings-ost

https://www.michaelhamiltonmusic.co.uk

Valiant Vikings currently only supports 16:9 resolution and Windows. I am working on multiple resolutions and Mac / Linux support for the full game! 

If you do have problems with the resolution, please tell me in the feedback section!
